title: IITM Pune Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 09 Consultant and Other Post
description: The Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology (IITM) Pune has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the Consultant, Laboratory Assistant, Project Assistant, and Associate Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, Post Graduation, B.Sc, B.E/ B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the IITM Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for t...
